title: Confessions
author: JGray
text: Nothing to see here. Move along.

replies.author: Sarrah*Guest*
replies.text: ...Sweet Andraste's knickers, that was longer than I intended it to be.  Sorry!

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text:
Well, i'll give it a week or so.

Unfortunately, it was the art at least as much as the story that first pulled me in.

Not sure i can stick it out if this is the new style.

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: Not slamming the new artist as an artist, it's just that the style just doesn't fit my vision of the story or characters, and i don't see how you could revise those enough to fit.

replies.author: Flinn*Guest*
replies.text:
Forgot to say this before I posted that...but that's just an idea I had that you could maybe do...
Anyway, I'll still be popping in on Mondays and Thursdays for the updates, whatever ends up happening.

replies.author: Ayshara*Guest*
replies.text: I agree, a better example of that would be http://www.aliendice.com/blog/2001/05/16/05162001/

replies.author: Azure*Guest*
replies.text: Gah! Vitamin X is mutating our characters! Scooby and Thelma have invaded the comic! The forcefields did nothing! ;p  Yeah, this is going to take quite a bit of getting used to.

replies.author: Darkwarrior42*Guest*
replies.text: This is my first and likely only comment... I don't even remember how I stumbled across this comic, but it took only one glance for it to become a comic I read on a regular basis. I enjoy artwork, yes... but far more, I enjoy story and concept. I do not mean to demean the work done by any artists in saying that... all I am saying is that I loved the comic from the first time I started reading it, because the story and universe have a unique feel, something that I am always interested in. I'll be sticking around as a reader so long as you keep updating; best wishes to you and those who work with you now and in the future

replies.author: Thinker*Guest*
replies.text: It sounds to me like Jessica was just being a baby about it. If Sarrah, who sounds like a professional, could honestly post the comment that she did above, then I say you were doing alright as a boss. On a side note, a true professional would never have burnt the bridges that Jessica did as she quit. You might honestly be better off with someone else.That said, please be careful. The artwork seems to be evolving into Order of The Stick. Just saying...
